altTitles.ja: 石に枕し流れに漱ぐ -その後-

altTitles.ja-ro: Ishi ni Makura shi Nagare ni Susugu
Ishi ni Makura shi Nagare ni Susugu -Sonogo-

altTitles.en: You've Laid In Your Bed, Now Make It
You've Laid In Your Bed, Now Make It -After-

description.en:
**Loving Blossoms**

**Sowing Seeds for a Lifelong Love**

Reflecting on their academic years, the couples of Fujimaru's newest book feature wallflowers blooming into superfreaks! The memories of desiring to talk to the girl of your dreams as she stands alone at the train station–her firm butt popping out just under her skirt and the lines of her tight vest hugging every curve of her chest, it's daunting! But once that opening blooms, the years of academic romance will spread like wildflowers!

1. Gal kara Manabu Ii Houhou (ギャルから学ぶイイ方法, A Kogal's Perfect Solution); Comic Kairakuten 2021-01
2. Sayonara Bluetooth (さよならブルートゥース, Farewell, Bluetooth); Comic Kairakuten 2021-07
3. Hello, My dog; Comic Kairakuten 2021-10
4. Suiyoubi ni Chikoku (水曜日に遅刻, Wednesday Rendezvous); Comic Kairakuten 2020-03
5. Aya wa Utakata Nogotoku (彩は泡沫の如く, Bubbling Over); Comic Kairakuten 2022-09
6. Onabe ga Yuku (お鍋がゆく, Onabe Awakens); Comic Kairakuten 2022-02
7. Ishi ni Makura shi Nagare ni Susugu (石に枕し流れに漱ぐ, You've Laid in Your Bed, Now Make It), Comic Kairakuten 2020-08
8. Ishi ni Makurashi Nagare ni Susugu -Sonogo- (石に枕し流れに漱ぐ -その後-, You've Laid In Your Bed, Now Make It -Afterstory- )
9. Kore kara no Kimi ni (これからの君に, To You, Now and Forever); Comic Kairakuten 2022-06
10. 1999; Comic Kairakuten 2022-11
